file_content.text: Czerka should crown you employee of the year. No--the decade!
I can't believe my visual receptors! The Emperor's Wrath!
A Dark Council member! Mixing with the rabble. How noble of you, my lord!
Hunter, it's you! The champion of the Great Hunt! What an honor!
There you are! The pillar of professionalism! Former star of Intelligence!
There you are! The paragon of Czerka's core values! The image of true greatness.
And you, too. Oh glorious day!
I am C-E29, booster of Czerka employee morale! And you are the lucky recipient of a message from the great Moff Kresk.
Sadly, the Republic has taken over Czerka and seized all corporate assets. Moff Kresk begs you to help rekindle the spark of Czerka within the Empire.
Tell Moff Kresk to prepare for my arrival.
I'm on my way.
Message transmitted. They will be so excited!
Czerka Corporation... the name rings a bell.
What is Czerka?
Weapons! Droids! Biological research! Czerka Corporation is the galaxy's industry leader in these categories and more!
Stop being so dramatic. This is Vaiken Spacedock, not a shareholder's meeting.
You're beginning to annoy me.
I am programmed for peak optimism. If you have a complaint, please file it with Czerka.
Moff Kresk awaits you with my master, Eva Kaayz. They will discuss the renewal of Czerka's great legacy!
Have an excellent day!
You'll always have a friend in Czerka Corporation!
